customerReview1: I have had multiple other hosting companies and none compare to them. I have had outstanding customer service with everything ive needed. They are fast to respond and help. The servers also run so smooth and i have yet to have a problem that was not an easy fix i could do myself or they have fixed for me. They are the only hosting company i will use from now on and i recommend everyone uses them!
customerReview2: After having problems with multiple other hosters due to bad server stability and support, we changed to Fragnet. The server stability is great and also the support has a very quick response time and tries it's best at every time.
customerReview3: Great response time and super helpful with all my questions as I have not done a Terraria server before, and coming from hosting MC servers it was a lot different.
customerReview4: I have had Minecraft servers hosted by Fragnet on their hardware in California and the Netherlands (for the Dutch end of my players) for several years. The reliability of the hosting is EXCELLENT. I want to emphasize the support offered. They are prompt, answer even dumb questions, and keep things running flawlessly. Support is often the weak point with game server hosts, but these people could not be better!!
FragnetDescription: Fragnet is a leading provider in online gaming services including game servers, dedicated gaming servers and voice over IP communication software. Our network infrastructure spans 22 data centres worldwide.
satisfactionGuaranteeDescription: If you are not satisfied within the first 5 days of your purchase, you can request a full refund!
powerfulHardwareDescription: We have recently changed all of our Intel E3 CPUs to more powerful ones, such as Intel's
ddr3toDdr4: We have also switched from DDR3 to DDR4 RAM.
instantSetupDescription: All game server orders are setup instantly after your payment have been received. The process starts right away and your service will be online within a few minutes.
serverMonitoringDescription: our NOC team is making sure everything is operational and your server runs smoothly!
gamingNetworksDescription: By carefully picking networks with low latency and high quality Internet bandwidth - we have the best possible foundation to host fast and reliable game servers.
controlPanelDescription: Stop/Start, install popular mods, create your own scheduled tasks (such as Steam update) or reinstall your server, each with just one click! We also offer full FTP access when possible.
protectionDescription: from 20 Gbps and up to 1 Tbps
getStartedDescription: Whether you want to play with your friends on a game server, host your Discord bot, host a voice server or have your very own Dedicated server - we've got you covered!
featuresDescription: Some of the features we include for each game server are but not limited to:
instantSetupDescription1: Once an invoice is paid, our system automatically starts setting up your server. If any issues arise during this process, our staff are notified to help complete this process.
serversLocations: Servers are available in more than 21 locations worldwide to ensure the lowest possible latency.
customizedSolutions: Fragnet offers customized solutions for all gaming services, allowing the customer to start with an affordable package while having the option to quickly upgrade to larger packages when needed.
findGame: Unable to find any game with ID:
sonsoftheforesth3: Craft, build, and struggle to survive
minecraft: Minecraft is a sandbox video game developed by Mojang
customDescription: Use the slider below to change plans
minecraftDescription: Explore infinite worlds and build everything from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off dangerous mobs.
paymentMethodsDescription: You can use any major credit card or your Paypal balance to make payments easily and securely. We also accept bank transfers.
errorDescription: The page that you were looking for could not be found
fragnet_description: Fragnet is a leading provider in online gaming services including game servers, dedicated gaming servers and voice over IP communication software. Our network infrastructure spans 22 data centres worldwide.
leading_provider: A leading provider in game servers!
good_network: A good network, though, is nothing without quality hardware. Our machines use only high end enterprise components. This ensures great reliability and performance of every service we offer.
since_the_beginning: Since the beginning we have worked tirelessly to provide a quality of service unmatched in our industry, not only in the services we offer but in the support we provide to each and every customer.
questions: Have any questions or need help?
staff_available: We have staff available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide assistance with all of your game server questions and needs.
all_game_server_orders: All game server orders are setup instantly after your payment have been received. The process starts right away and your service will be online within a few minutes.
switch_location: You can switch the geographical location of your game server for free. Head over to our Latency test page to test your ping against all of our locations!
carefully_picking: By carefully picking networks with low latency and high quality Internet bandwidth - we have the best possible foundation to host fast and reliable game servers.
easily_have_members: Easily have members donate directly to your account. We provide the tool to help you with sharing the expenses of your gaming services.
start_stop: Stop/Start, install popular mods, create your own scheduled tasks (such as steam update) or reinstall your server, each with just one click! We also offer full FTP access when possible.
battlefield_partner: Exclusivly hosting major Battlefield titles released between 2011 and 2015.
bohemia_partner: Hosting Official DayZ servers in the South America region.
esl_partner: ESL takes advantage of our on-demand game server platform to host CS:GO servers for their Open Cups hosted in Europe.
esportal_partner: Esportal is a web-based competitive arena for CS:GO. Through our partnership we provide lag-free servers across the globe.
everyday_partner: on Minecraft is an exciting and important initiative where we both educates and empowers children to become a “Caring buddy” that helps other children and young people. Behind the initiative is the non-profit organization
affiliateDescription: is free to join, it's easy to sign-up and get going. By signing up you provide yourself the opportunity to earn recurring credit each month your referral continues as a customer.
affiliateDescription1: You may use these funds to purchase any service on Fragnets website. If you sell a €30/month server, you can earn as much as €6/month as long as they stay a customer. Do that 4 times and you have enough credit to get a 32 slots game server!
affiliateDescription2: When you join the Fragnet.net affiliate program, you will be supplied with a range of banners and text links that you may place on your web site, friends web sites, forum signatures, etc. When a user clicks on one of your links to Fragnet.net, their purchase will be tracked by Fragnet.net. You will earn a commission of up to 15% from that point forward until the customer cancel's their account. By signing up to our Affiliate Program, you are also entitled to €5 bonus deposit.
affiliateDescription3: Fragnet.net receives lots of sponsorship requests. These requests all provide the same message, Sponsor us and we'll advertise your company! Well, we have an even better plan. Use our Affiliate program and you'll earn money for your clan to use for services! No need to be in the mercy of any GSP, all of the sudden terminating your sponsored server without a reason.
affiliateDescription4: Login 24 hours a day to check your sales, traffic, account balance and see how your banners are performing.
salesDeliver: 10% of all sales you deliver, recurring
minimumEarn: Minimum to earn before being able to use credit
bonus: Bonus automatically added to your Affiliate account upon signup
comissionDelayDescription: 30 days - Payout delay time, to prevent fraudulent activities
agreement: Upon agreement between Fragnet and you.
host_bots: Host bots which show your game server status live on your discord, bots which help with the overall administration of your server or music streaming bots!
how_long_does_it_take_bot: How long does it take to setup my Discord bot?
all_bot_servers_setup: Discord bots are setup instantly after the invoice is paid. The process starts right away and your service is created within a minute.
edit_files_with_ease: Edit files with ease, keep your server up to date, and install a wide variety of mods with just one click.
how_long_does_it_take: How long does it take to setup my server?
all_game_servers_setup: All Game Servers are setup instantly after payments are processed. The process starts right away and your service is online within the matter of a few minutes.
create_sub_users_description: Our panel allows you to create as many sub users as you need, as well as set specific permissions per your needs.
upgrade_downgrade_description: Upgrading/Downgrading your server can easily be done at any time through your billing panel and the changes are applied to your server at once!
test_ping: How can I test my ping?
test_ping_description: Head over to our Latency Test page to check your ping against all of our locations.
donate_to_server: Can someone donate to my server?
donate_to_server_description: We use a system called 'Clan Pay' which allows donations directly to your account that way you can share the expenses of your gaming services.
location_transfer: Can I transfer my server to another location?
location_transfer_description: Yes, free of charge. Simply open a ticket with us and we will proceed with the transfer at your prefered timeslot.
request_refund_description: If you are not satisfied within the first 4 days of your purchase, you can request a full refund!
notListed: Don't see your game server listed?
alreadyHosting: Chances we’re already hosting it or it is coming soon!
myPing: My ping above is too high/not accurate
pingExplanation: The latency test is based on HTTP requests and therefore may not reflect your real latency to our servers.
tryTestServer: Can I try a test server?
tryTestServerDescription: While we don't have any public test servers at the moment, if you reach out to us we can always setup a test server for you in a nearby location.
offerDDoSprotectionDescription: All of our game servers come with DDoS protection however the protection level may vary per location. Check out our
voiceServersDescription: You get complete control over your Voice service and it's all in one place! Our Voice servers are designed to meet needs from small clans to massive communities or businesses!
voiceServersDescription1: The concept behind our voice based services is quite advanced to ensure that your Voice service runs without issue. With our advanced monitoring system we monitor every aspect of the environment that the Voice services run on to ensure that other users services will not affect your services
reasonsToChoose: Here are just a few reasons to choose Fragnet as your host.
pleaseNote: Please note that some services may be excluded from these offers, see our
professionalTechnicalSupportDescription: We have staff available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide assistance. Our staff has vast experience from more than 50 different games.
instantSetupDescription2: All Game Servers are setup instantly after payments are processed. The process starts right away and your service is online within the matter of a few minutes.
locationSwitchingDescription: You can switch the geographical location of your game server. Feel free to use the following website to test your ping against all of our locations
stateofTheArtDescription: All of our game servers are running on cutting edge Enterprise Hardware. We always make sure to run on top notch hardware as we constantly strive to replaced any outdated servers that don't meet our performance expectations.
monitoringDescription: We monitor all our hardware and software 24/7. We make sure our systems are running optimal, to ensure the best possible gaming experience.
careersDescription: Fragnet is rapidly growing, and we are now looking for experienced, technically minded, friendly individuals that will work well on the team. Customer satisfaction is where we excel, along with high-quality services.
careersDescription2: Our game server hosting platform and support backend are all carefully structured, and we have very specific and fair policies that are easy to understand, follow and clarify to clients. You can understand what products we offer and which you will have to support on our website.
careersDescription3: We are always looking for talented people to join our team. If you are interested in working with us, please send an email to jobs [at] fragnet.net
steamGames: New Steam games, you can never have enough of them!
freeHosting: As a member of our team, you will be able to host game servers and/or your personal 'homelab', free of charge.
careersYubiKey: You get a free YubiKey which you can use for both personal and work accounts.
careersMerch: Cool merch to keep you warm during the winter and cool during the summer!
careersRemote: Our team is spread across the world, so you can work from anywhere.
careersApply: Apply today by sending us your CV!
